extendedIngredients.name: coconut
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup of shredded coconut, split in half

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
milk
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 - 14 oz. container of TruMoo Strawberry Milk

recipes.title: Strawberry Banana Coconut Creamsicles
recipes.instructions: In a large blender combine all ingredients {make sure to only use 1/2 cup of the shredded coconut}. Blend the ingredients until smooth, taste and adjust with more honey for sweetness.Put a small sprinkle of shredded coconut on the bottom of each popsicle mold, pour a layer of the strawberry banana cream mixture, add another layer of coconut, another layer of the strawberry cream mixture and end with another sprinkle of shredded coconut {make sure to only fill your popsicle molds up about 3/4 of the way as they expand a bit when they freeze}.Place the popsicle mold in the freezer for 7 hours or overnight. Enjoy!

steps.step: In a large blender combine all ingredients {make sure to only use 1/2 cup of the shredded coconut}. Blend the ingredients until smooth, taste and adjust with more honey for sweetness.Put a small sprinkle of shredded coconut on the bottom of each popsicle mold, pour a layer of the strawberry banana cream mixture, add another layer of coconut, another layer of the strawberry cream mixture and end with another sprinkle of shredded coconut {make sure to only fill your popsicle molds up about 3/4 of the way as they expand a bit when they freeze}.
Place the popsicle mold in the freezer for 7 hours or overnight. Enjoy!
